format: html

## Packages

```{r}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
library(duckdb)
library(DBI)
library(sessioninfo)
```

## Database connection

```{r}
con <- dbConnect(duckdb(), "../database/eventos.duckdb")
```

## Data import

```{r}
cases_file <- "../dados/tb_deng_chagas_zik_chko.csv"
```

```{r}
tmp <- read_csv2(file = cases_file) |>
  mutate(
    sex = case_match(
      sex,
      "M" ~ "1",
      "F" ~ "2",
      .default = sex
    )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    geocod = as.numeric(geocod),
    year = as.numeric(year),
    month = as.numeric(month),identity via certificates. Firefox does not trust this site because it uses a certificate that is not valid for pr
if (dbExistsTable(con, "dengue_sim")) dbRemoveTable(con, "dengue_sim")

dbWriteTable(
  conn = con,
  name = "dengue_sim",
  value = tmp |>
    filter(health == "Dengue", source == "SIM") |>
    select(-health, -source)
)
```

### Dengue (SINAN)

```{r}
if (dbExistsTable(con, "dengue_sinan")) dbRemoveTable(con, "dengue_sinan")

dbWriteTable(
  conn = con,
  name = "dengue_sinan",
  value = tmp |>
    filter(health == "Dengue", source == "SINAN") |>
    select(-health, -source)
)
```
